description: Mr Adams served as a TD in Louth for nine years and Sinn F¨¦in from 1983 to 2018.
title: Gerry Adams 'emotional' at standing down as TD in Louth
title_page: Gerry Adams 'emotional' at standing down as TD in Louth - BBC News
maintext: "This included developing alternatives to Brexit, advancing the national cause, co-operating with neighbouring border counties and campaigning for projects like Narrow Water Bridge which as recently as last week we succeeded in getting into the 'New Decade, New Approach' agreement, which enabled the re-establishment of the power sharing government at Stormont."
